title: Mel Cundiff Biology Endowment Fund
description: To provide a financial award at the Spring Commencement ceremonies for the outstanding full-time juniors majoring in EBIO as determined by overall GPA at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide a financial award at the Spring Commencement ceremonies for the outstanding full-time juniors majoring in EBIO as determined by overall GPA at the University of Colorado Boulder.
